description: According to the OSAPI v1.1 API spec (http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/ChangesSince.html) we need to support a changes-since query parameter on /v1.1/<tenant>/servers
title: OSAPI v1.1 needs to support changes-since on servers resource

comments.content: According to the OSAPI v1.1 API spec (http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/ChangesSince.html) we need to support a changes-since query parameter on /v1.1/<tenant>/servers
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
